objenome.solver.evolve

Class GenerationalStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.solver.evolve.Pipeline
      • objenome.solver.evolve.GenerationalStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener<ConfigEvent>, EvolutionaryStrategy, PopulationProcess

    public class GenerationalStrategy
extends Pipeline
implements EvolutionaryStrategy, Listener<ConfigEvent>
    A GenerationalStrategy is an evolutionary strategy with clearly defined generations. It consists of a main loop that is executed until a termination criteria is met. At each iteration of the loop, a new population is created using the pipeline's components. The main loop can be illustrated as: 
      while (!terminate) {
        generate (and optionally evaluate) new population
  }
    The PopulationTermination is obtained from the GPContainer, using the appropriate ConfigKey. A new population is generated using the pipeline's components, which typically will include a Breeder and FitnessEvaluator instances.
    See Also:
    Breeder, FitnessEvaluator, PopulationTermination

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public Population process(Population population)
        Evolves the population until the termination criteria is met. A GenerationEvent.StartGeneration event is fired at the start of the generation and an GenerationEvent.EndGeneration event at the end of the generation.
        Specified by:
        process in interface PopulationProcess
        Overrides:
        process in class Pipeline
        Parameters:
        population - the population to be evolved
        Returns:
        the evolved population.

      • terminate

        protected boolean terminate()
        Returns true if any of the termination criteria is met.
        Returns:
        true if any of the termination criteria is met; false otherwise.
